description:
*Want to give balance to the world? Click SUBSCRIBE* ► https://tinyurl.com/FT-BalancetheWorld

After watching this, you may NEVER see Uncle Iroh the same ever again! Yes, we're putting the lovable firebender from Avatar: The Last Airbender - and a bit of The Legend of Korra - on trial for his crimes. No, we're not just talking about stealing an extra cup of tea from Aang, Toph, Sokka, Katara, and Zuko; we're talking about REAL crimes... war crimes! Is Uncle Iroh really a war criminal? Or should we set him free?
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐

title: Film Theory: What Avatar Never Told You About Uncle Iroh (Avatar the Last Airbender)
